languages.text: "Конечно, на Эурак-V тоже было обширное книгохранилище, вот только большинство трудов в нем посвящалось разного рода учениям. Лишь в редкие минуты отдыха мне было дозволено предаваться забвению на страницах литературы художественной". {n}Кассия бережно смахивает пыль с обложки узкой когтистой ладонью, и взгляд ее полнится тоской от воспоминаний об утерянном доме.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, на Эурак-V тоже было обширное книгохранилище, вот только большинство трудов в нем посвящалось разного рода учениям. Лишь в редкие минуты отдыха мне было дозволено предаваться забвению на страницах литературы художественной". {n}Кассия бережно смахивает пыль с обложки узкой когтистой ладонью, и взгляд ее полнится тоской от воспоминаний об утерянном доме.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Конечно, на Эурак-V тоже было обширное книгохранилище, вот только большинство трудов в нем посвящалось разного рода учениям. Лишь в редкие минуты отдыха мне было дозволено предаваться забвению на страницах литературы художественной". {n}Кассия бережно смахивает пыль с обложки узкой когтистой ладонью, и взгляд ее полнится тоской от воспоминаний об утерянном доме.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, Eurac V had a vast library archive of its own, however, most of the works within had to do with disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of fiction." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after having reminisced about her lost home.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, Eurac V had a vast library archive of its own, however, most of the works within had to do with disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of fiction." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after having reminisced about her lost home.{/n}

Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of fiction." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}

Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of fiction." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eurac V hatte natürlich auch ein gewaltiges Archiv, wenn auch die meisten Werke darin wissenschaftlicher Natur waren, zu allen möglichen Fachgebieten. Nur in meinen seltenen Augenblicken der Freizeit war es mir gestattet, in die Seiten etwas ausgeschmückterer Werke zu entfliehen." {n}Cassia wischt mit ihrer dünnen, klauenbewehrten Hand sanft den Staub vom Einband. Durch das Schwelgen in Erinnerungen an ihre verlorene Heimat liegt Sehnsucht in ihren Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eurac V hatte natürlich auch ein gewaltiges Bibiliotheksarchiv, wenn auch die meisten Werke darin wissenschaftlicher Natur waren, zu allen möglichen Fachgebieten. Nur in meinen seltenen Augenblicken der Freizeit war es mir gestattet, in die Seiten der Belletristik zu entfliehen." {n}Cassia wischt mit ihrer dünnen, klauenbewehrten Hand sanft den Staub vom Einband. Durch das Schwelgen in Erinnerungen an ihre verlorene Heimat liegt Sehnsucht in ihren Augen.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Eurac-V possédait également de vastes archives, bien entendu, mais la plupart des ouvrages disponibles traitaient d'une discipline scientifique ou d'une autre. Je n'étais autorisée à m'évader dans les pages de tomes plus allégoriques que lors de mes rares moments de répit. » {n}Cassia époussette délicatement la couverture de sa fine main griffue, les yeux emplis de nostalgie après avoir repensé à son foyer perdu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Eurac-V possédait également de vastes archives de livres, bien entendu, mais la plupart des ouvrages disponibles traitaient d'une discipline scientifique ou d'une autre. Je n'étais autorisée à m'évader dans des pages de fiction que lors de mes rares moments de répit. » {n}Cassia époussette délicatement la couverture de sa fine main griffue, les yeux emplis de nostalgie après avoir repensé à son foyer perdu.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “欧拉克五号星站当然也有自己的大资料库，不过其中绝大部分藏书都与某些特定学科的知识有关。只有在学习知识的短暂休息中，我才有机会放纵自己读一些更加美妙的作品。”{n}卡西娅用细长的指爪轻轻拂去封面的尘埃。提起已经失落的故乡，她的目光流露出深切的怀念。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “欧拉克五号星当然也有自己的图书馆，不过其中绝大部分藏书都与某些特定学科的知识有关。只有在学习知识的短暂休息中，我才有机会放纵自己读一些小说。”{n}卡西娅用细长的指爪轻轻拂去封面的尘埃。提起已经失落的故乡，她的目光流露出深切的怀念。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ユーラック・Vには膨大な蔵書のアーカイブがあります。もちろん、そこにある作品の大部分は、ある種の、または別の学術的な規則によるものでした。短い休息の間だけ、私はフィクションの世界に逃げることが許されていました」{n}カシアは表紙に積もる埃を、爪のついた細い手で優しく払いのける。彼女の瞳には、失われた彼女の家の思い出への切望があふれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ユーラック・Vには膨大な蔵書のアーカイブがあります。もちろん、そこにある作品の大部分は、ある種の、または別の学術的な規則によるものでした。短い休息の間だけ、私は虚構の世界のページに逃げることが許されていました」{n}カシアは表紙に積もる埃を、爪のついた細い手で優しく払いのける。失われた家を思う彼女の瞳は、懐かしさで満ちていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Eurac V disponía de un vasto archivo propio, por supuesto, aunque la mayoría de las obras que contenía tenían que ver con disciplinas eruditas de varios tipos. Solo se me permitía escapar a las páginas menos educativas en mis escasos tiempos libres». {n}Cassia quita suavemente el polvo de la cubierta con su mano con los ojos llenos de nostalgia tras recordar su hogar perdido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eurac V disponía de un vasto archivo propio, por supuesto, aunque la mayoría de las obras que contenía tenían que ver con disciplinas eruditas de varios tipos. Solo se me permitía escapar a las páginas menos educativas en mis escasos tiempos libres». {n}Cassia quita suavemente el polvo de la cubierta con su mano con los ojos llenos de nostalgia tras recordar su hogar perdido.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}

languages.text: "Eurac V'in de geniş bir arşivi vardı elbette lakin eserlerin çoğu o veya bu akademik disiplin üzerineydi. Yalnızca mola verebildiğim o nadir anlarda, daha süslü metinler içeren eserlerin sayfaları arasında kaybolmama izin vardı." {n}Cassia, uzun tırnaklı ince eliyle kitap kapağındaki tozu nazikçe siliyor. Yitirdiği evini hatırlamasıyla beraber gözleri özlemle doluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Eurac V had a vast archive of its own, of course, although most of the works within had to do with scholarly disciplines of some sort or another. Only in my sparse moments of respite was I allowed to escape into the pages of more embellished works." {n}Cassia gently brushes the dust off the cover with her thin, clawed hand, her eyes filled with longing after reminiscing about her lost home.{/n}
